amendment.description: An amendment numbered 47 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit funds for Department of Energy Office of Science's Office of Scientific Workforce Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (SW-DEI).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 207 - 204 (Roll no. 548).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 207 - 204 (Roll no. 548).
